about_the_game:
This is a third-person action roguelite game. Players will play one of several protagonists to challenge powerful enemies in the Animal Realm and solve the source of the mutation.

The game will include 4 protagonists with different fighting styles to unlock, more than 12 boss battles based on various Touhou characters, and nearly 100 kinds of enhanced abilities.

●EXCITING BATTLE

In terms of combat, the operation is simplified, while the operation threshold is minimized as much as possible, while retaining the tension and excitement brought by action games.

Press the charge attack button at the moment when the threat is approaching to block the enemy's attack and complete the charge. In some enemy melee moves, using block can effectively cause the enemy to be stiff, providing you with an opportunity to attack.

Clear all obstacles with flawless skill!

In battle, all protagonists have both melee and ranged attack modes, which can be switched flexibly in battle.

Players' attacks can break some of the enemy's barrages and recycle energy to strengthen themselves.

Accumulated damage can break the shield of powerful enemies, and offense and defense can be switched, giving players attacking opportunities.

Keep your distance at the right time to deal with dangerous situations with long-range attacks, and accumulate strength to eliminate all the barrage in one fell swoop!

●RICH TALENT ENHANCEMENT

During the process, each protagonist has a unique enhancement ability to choose from, and some powerful enhancement abilities will directly change the character's fighting style.

After clearing the source of mutation in an area each time, the player will gain an enhancement ability and various status recovery items.

Face all challenges with the strongest attitude!

●HIGHLY ANTICIPATED CHARACTERS

As the Primate Spirit Garden is restored, it will attract visitors of all kinds.

Players will meet visitors of different characteristics in the game and get their help.

Let’s liven up the Primate Spirit Garden!

I hope that more people can experience the charm of action roguelike games and the Touhou Project.

content_descriptors.notes: In some of the larger movements, you may see some characters' underwear under their skirts.

detailed_description:
This is a third-person action roguelite game. Players will play one of several protagonists to challenge powerful enemies in the Animal Realm and solve the source of the mutation.

The game will include 4 protagonists with different fighting styles to unlock, more than 12 boss battles based on various Touhou characters, and nearly 100 kinds of enhanced abilities.

In terms of combat, the operation is simplified, while the operation threshold is minimized as much as possible, while retaining the tension and excitement brought by action games.

Press the charge attack button at the moment when the threat is approaching to block the enemy's attack and complete the charge. In some enemy melee moves, using block can effectively cause the enemy to be stiff, providing you with an opportunity to attack.

Clear all obstacles with flawless skill!

In battle, all protagonists have both melee and ranged attack modes, which can be switched flexibly in battle.

Players' attacks can break some of the enemy's barrages and recycle energy to strengthen themselves.

Accumulated damage can break the shield of powerful enemies, and offense and defense can be switched, giving players attacking opportunities.

Keep your distance at the right time to deal with dangerous situations with long-range attacks, and accumulate strength to eliminate all the barrage in one fell swoop!

I hope that more people can experience the charm of action roguelike games and the Touhou Project.
name: 东方异域见闻 ~ Touhou Dystopian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or Intel Arc A380
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 or Intel Arc A750
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: "Touhou Dystopian" is an Touhou Project fan game developed by me personally. In the game, players can control popular Touhou characters with different fighting styles, and embark on an unknown journey to solve the mutation in the Primate Spirit Garden and the Animal Realm.
